item.title: Make MacOS Notifications From RSS Feed Using Python
item.description: Today we are going to see how make OSX notifications from RSS Feed of any website using Python. So first of all, let us see how to make a simple notification. We are going to use AppleScript for this.|||||||||| Command for notification in AppleScript Go to terminal and Type: >>osascript -e 'display notification "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet" with title "Title"' We shall see a notification popping up in right up corner like this:
